creator: BNP PARIBAS
descriptionHtml:
L'appli « Personeo » de BNP PARIBAS ÉPARGNE & RETRAITE ENTREPRISES : mes projets sont à portée de main avec mon épargne salariale !

Une application simple et pratique pour gérer mon compte épargne salariale en toute liberté.


J’ACCÈDE À TOUTES MES INFORMATIONS :

• Je consulte le montant net/brut de mon épargne salariale disponible et indisponible.
• J'active la vision globale de mes comptes (Épargne salariale, PER Entreprises et Compte Titres)
• Je retrouve les informations qui m’intéressent:
La répartition de mon épargne par dispositif (PEE, PERCO), par support de placement ou par date de disponibilité.
Les plus ou moins-values latentes par support de placement.
Le détail sur les supports de placement proposés : niveau de risque, durée de placement conseillée, informations financières.(évolution des supports en mode graphique).
• Je consulte l’historique de mes opérations.
• Je consulte et traite les messages d’informations ou alertes liés à mes opérations.
• Je me renseigne sur les différents cas de déblocage anticipé de mon épargne.
• Je peux personnaliser mon mot de passe.




JE RÉALISE MES OPÉRATIONS ESSENTIELLES :

• J'affecte ma participation et/ou mon intéressement.
• Pour me constituer une épargne, je saisis des versements volontaires ponctuels par carte bancaire/ prélèvement ou je mets en place un versement programmé.
• Je transfère/arbitre mon épargne entre les supports proposés par mon entreprise.
• Je demande le remboursement de mon épargne disponible, avec la possibilité, si je le souhaite, de fixer un seuil de déclenchement.
• Je mets à jour mes coordonnées bancaires et personnelles.
• Je suis l'avancement de mes opérations en cours de traitement et peux les annuler si besoin.




LES OUTILS & SERVICES À MA DISPOSITION :

• La connexion devient plus simple avec l'empreinte digitale (si votre téléphone est compatible);
• Dès la page d'accueil, affichage du montant de l'abondement déjà perçu et de l'abondement potentiel.
• Je compare les supports de placement pour faciliter mon choix.
• Je crée une alerte sur les supports et serai informé(e) quand la valeur souhaitée est atteinte.
• J'optimise mon épargne salariale grâce aux simulateurs.
• J'accède aux offres privilèges de BNP PARIBAS.
• J'active la vision globale de mes comptes (PEE, PERCO, PER Entreprise, compte titres).
• Mes abonnements gratuits:
• E-Documents
• Notifications des opérations par mail et/ou SMS
• Historique des connexions à votre compte




JE RESTE EN CONTACT :
Si j’ai besoin d’aide, mes contacts sont à portée de main !
descriptionShort: A simple and practical application to manage your employee savings

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Estimez votre abondement au moment de votre versement volontaire ou votre choix pour la participation/ intéressement.
Informez-vous sur les nouveaux cas de déblocage anticipé de votre épargne.

Cette version comporte d'autres améliorations.
Bénéficiez de toutes les fonctionnalités en téléchargeant la dernière version de l'appli Personeo.

Une question, un problème technique, contactez-nous par mail à paris_bnppere_marketing_salaries@bnpparibas.com
Nous restons à votre écoute…

title: Personeo

creator: BNP PARIBAS
descriptionHtml:
BNP Paribas Epargne et Retraite Entreprises “Personeo” app is a simple and practical application for managing business savings.

USEFUL INFORMATION ON THE HOME PAGE:
• Amount of savings available now or later.
• Global vision of accounts (Employee savings plan, Corporate PER and Securities Account)
• Breakdown of savings by device (PEE, PERCO, PERECO), by investment medium or by date of availability.
• Unrealized capital gains or losses by investment vehicle or by device,
• News messages and alerts when a transaction is to be entered.
• Amount of the matching contribution already collected and the potential matching contribution.
THE CENTRAL MENU TO CARRY OUT THE ESSENTIAL OPERATIONS:
• Make choices for participation and / or profit-sharing.
• Build up savings with one-off voluntary payment by bank card / direct debit or set up a scheduled payment.
• Transfer / arbitrate your savings between the supports offered by your company.
• Request reimbursement of available savings, with the possibility, depending on the case, of setting a trigger threshold.

OPTIMIZE YOUR SAVINGS AND DECISION-MAKING:
• Access all the information on investment vehicles and the possibility of comparing them (KIID, performance, level of risk, recommended investment period, etc.)
• Create an alert on an investment medium and be informed when the desired value is reached.
• Simulators

HISTORY:
Monitor the progress of its operations and cancel them if necessary.


PROFILE:

• View and update personal and banking data.
• Manage your free subscriptions: to e-Documents, notifications, privileged offers.
• Change his password, activate his biometric connection.
• Contacts
descriptionShort: A simple and practical application to manage your employee savings

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Discover the new Personeo app!

Completely revised, live the new experience of corporate savings.
To take advantage of it now, install or update the Personeo app.

Share your experience by leaving us a comment.
Thank you for using the Personeo application from BNP Paribas Epargne et Retraite Entreprises.
For any questions, contact us directly by email at paris_bnppere_marketing_salaries@bnpparibas.com

descriptionShort: A simple and practical application to manage your employee savings

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
All your e-Documents are now accessible from the Personeo app, under Profile > E-Documents!

This release includes other improvements and bug fixes.
Take advantage of all the features by downloading the latest version of the Personeo app.

A question, a technical problem, contact us directly by email at paris_bnppere_marketing_salaries@bnpparibas.com
We remain at your disposal…

title: Personeo

creator: BNP PARIBAS
descriptionHtml:
The "Personeo" app from BNP Paribas Epargne et Retraite Entreprises is a simple and practical application for managing your company savings.

pee,peg,bnp,savings,salary,personeo,profit-sharing,payment

ON THE HOME PAGE, USEFUL INFORMATION:

• Amount of savings available now or later.
• Global vision of the accounts (Employee savings, PER Companies and Securities Account)
• Breakdown of savings by investment vehicle or by date of availability.
• Unrealized capital gains or losses by investment medium or by device,
• News messages and alerts when a trade is due.
• Amount of the employer's contribution already received and of the potential employer's contribution.


THE CENTRAL MENU TO PERFORM THE ESSENTIAL OPERATIONS:

• Make your choices for participation and/or profit-sharing.
• Build up savings with one-time voluntary payment by bank card/ direct debit or set up a programmed payment.
• Transfer/arbitrate your savings between the supports offered by your company.
• Request repayment of their available savings, with the possibility, depending on the case, of setting a trigger threshold.


OPTIMIZE YOUR SAVINGS AND DECISION-MAKING SUPPORT:

• Access all the information on the investment vehicles and the possibility of comparing them (KIID, performance, level of risk, recommended investment period, etc.)
• Create an alert on an investment medium and be informed when the desired value is reached.
• Simulators
• Estimate of the matching contribution to be received at the time of entry of your voluntary payment or your choice for participation/profit-sharing.


HISTORY:

Follow the progress of its operations and cancel them if necessary.


PROFILE :

• View and update personal and bank details.
• Find e-Documents and simply manage your free subscription.
• Manage your other free subscriptions: notifications and privilege offers.
• Modify his password, activate his biometric connection.
• Contacts
• View the accessibility statement
descriptionShort: A simple and practical application to manage your employee savings

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
You can enter the reimbursement of your unavailable savings and recover it to carry out your projects!
The mobile app accessibility statement.

This release includes bug fixes.
Take advantage of all the features by downloading the latest version of the Personeo app.

A question, a technical problem, contact us directly by email at paris_bnppere_marketing_salaries@bnpparibas.com
We remain at your disposal…

• Amount of the employer's contribution already received and of the potential employer's contribution.


THE CENTRAL MENU TO PERFORM THE ESSENTIAL OPERATIONS:

• Make your choices for participation and/or profit-sharing.
• Build up savings with one-time voluntary payment by bank card/ direct debit or set up a programmed payment.
• Transfer/arbitrate your savings between the supports offered by your company.
• Request repayment of their available savings, with the possibility, depending on the case, of setting a trigger threshold.


OPTIMIZE YOUR SAVINGS AND DECISION-MAKING SUPPORT:

• Access all the information on the investment vehicles and the possibility of comparing them (KIID, performance, level of risk, recommended investment period, etc.)
• Create an alert on an investment medium and be informed when the desired value is reached.
• Simulators
• Estimate of the matching contribution to be received at the time of entry of your voluntary payment or your choice for participation/profit-sharing.


HISTORY:

Follow the progress of its operations and cancel them if necessary.


PROFILE :

• View and update personal and bank details.
• Find e-Documents and simply manage your free subscription.
• Manage your other free subscriptions: notifications and privilege offers.
• Modify his password, activate his biometric connection.
• Contacts
• View the accessibility statement
descriptionShort: A simple and practical application to manage your employee savings

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This update includes some minor changes and fixes.

A question, a technical problem, contact us directly by email at CRDF.FREXPERIENCEETOFFREDIGITALES@bnpparibas.com
We remain at your disposal…
